committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To provide that certain hearings functions of the Merit Systems Protection Board be performed only by administrative law judges, and for other purposes.
short_title: Merit Systems Protection Board Administrative Judges Protection Act of 1993

summary.text: Merit Systems Protection Board Administrative Judges Protection Act of 1993 - Amends Federal law to: (1) eliminate the status of "administrative judges of the Merit Systems Protection Board (MSPB)" (who are subject to removal, suspension, and performance appraisal by their agency on their hearing and decision-making functions); and (2) deem existing MSPB administrative judges to be administrative law judges (who are not subject to such agency action).

titles.title: Merit Systems Protection Board Administrative Judges Protection Act of 1993
To provide that certain hearings functions of the Merit Systems Protection Board be performed only by administrative law judges, and for other purposes.
